topic.title: Install the HP Helion Development Platform

section.title: Step 1. Download the Latest Version of HP Helion Development Platform
section.p: The installation of the HP Helion Development Platform for HP Helion OpenStack is provided as a small compressed tar file. The images for the actual services will be downloaded at the installer's request.

ol.li: Navigate to the the HP Helion Download Network (HDN) and log in. If necessary, create an account first.
Download the Development Platform Installer 2.0.0.0 beta package.

section.title: Step 2. Install the HP Helion Development Platform
section.note: For help with the installer, enter the command openstack hdpi

ol.li:
If your network uses a proxy, it may be necessary to set the https_proxy shell variable so that the installer may download required Python libraries from the pypi site. To set the https_proxy shell variable, enter the following command:export https_proxy={ip address or url of http proxy}
Example:export https_proxy=http://proxy.example.com

Confirm that you have access to the pypi site. The following commands will verify access to the site and download one of the prerequisite files as a brief test. If ping is unavailable, use wget.ping pypi.python.org sudo -E pip install python-novaclient

If your network uses a proxy, you must define the proxy exclusion list so that proxies are not used for communicating with the services in the overcloud. To define the proxy exclusion list, enter the following command:export no_proxy=localhost,127.0.0.1, <ip address or host name of identity service aka keystone>
Example:
export no_proxy=localhost,127.0.0.1,10.0.0.10
Install python-dev sudo apt-get install python-dev
Install the Development Platform Installer in the Virtual Environment .pip install DevelopmentPlatformInstaller.2.0.0.0.tar.gz
